base.cachedResultName: To Extract Pdf file data from Emails

messageValues.message:
Given the following invoice in the <invoice> xml tags, extract the following information as listed below.
If you cannot find the information for a specific item, then leave blank and skip to the next.

* Description - short (1-2 line) description of the invoice e.g. Monthly database usage for Supabase - REQUIRED
* Type - [OPTIONS: Monthly Recurring, Annual Recurring, Single Payment] - REQUIRED
* Invoice date (date invoice received) - REQUIRED
* Payment date (date that payment will come out - this is not always the same as the invoice sent date) - REQUIRED
* Invoice number - REQUIRED
* Purchase order number
* Supplier name
* Supplier VAT identification number
* Line items, including a description of the goods or services rendered
* Price with and without VAT (without currency)
* Total price (without currency) - REQUIRED
* Currency (USD, Euro, GBP) - REQUIRED
* Additional information you deem important that isn't included above

Additional important information such as:
- Payment terms (Net 30, immediate payment, etc.)
- Payment methods accepted
- Bank account details if provided
- Discount terms or early payment incentives
- Late payment penalties or interest rates
- Tax exemption references
- Contract or framework agreement references
- Delivery terms
- Special instructions
- Contact information for billing inquiries
- Return/refund policies
- Warranty information if applicable
- Certificate of origin if present
- Insurance requirements
- Customs information for international shipments

headers.subject: Subject: Couldn't process payment

json.html:
Hi Mukhtar,

Thank you for using Cursor!

We've encountered an issue processing your subscription payment. You can address this by visiting the Billing & Invoices section in your dashboard. For reference, your account is registered with Google (ubaidmukhtar237@gmail.com).

If you need any help, reply to this email or reach out to us at hi@cursor.com.

Best,
Cursor Team
